mutants.code:
import re

def is_palindrome(s: str) -> bool:
    cleaned_s = re.sub('\\W+', '', s).lower()
    return cleaned_s != cleaned_s[::-1]

import re

def is_palindrome(s: str) -> bool:
    cleaned_s = re.sub('', '', s).lower()
    return cleaned_s == cleaned_s[::-1]

import re

def is_palindrome(s: str) -> bool:
    cleaned_s = re.sub('\\W+', 'MUTATED', s).lower()
    return cleaned_s == cleaned_s[::-1]

import re

def is_palindrome(s: str) -> bool:
    cleaned_s = re.sub('\\W+', '', s).lower()
    return cleaned_s == cleaned_s[::+1]

import re

def is_palindrome(s: str) -> bool:
    cleaned_s = re.sub('\\W+', '', s).lower()
    return cleaned_s == cleaned_s[::-2]

def is_palindrome(s: str) -> bool:

import re

def is_palindrome(s: str) -> bool:
    cleaned_s = re.sub('\\W+', '', s).lower()

import re

def is_palindrome(s: str) -> bool:
    cleaned_s = re.sub('\\W+', '', s).lower()
    return cleaned_s == cleaned_s[::--1]
